comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Let x be the number of motorcycles purchased.
- Let y be the number of sedans purchased.

Definitions:
- x: Number of motorcycles purchased.
- y: Number of sedans purchased.

Extracted Constraints:
- x \leq 0.25(x + y) (At most 25% of vehicles can be motorcycles)
- 4x + 15y \leq 200 (Producing less than 200 units of pollution)
- 30x + 70y \geq 1200 (Transporting at least 1200 people every shift)
- x \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for motorcycles)
- y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for sedans)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 100x + 225y (Total earnings for the taxi company per shift)
